scripts.css-layout: sass styles/layout.scss styles/layout.css && sass styles/layout_tens.scss styles/layout_tens.css && sass styles/layout_tens_t2.scss styles/layout_tens_t2.css && sass styles/layout_tens_t1.scss styles/layout_tens_t1.css && sass styles/layout_tens_t0.scss styles/layout_tens_t0.css && sass styles/layout_tens_e0.scss styles/layout_tens_e0.css && sass styles/layout_tens_w0.scss styles/layout_tens_w0.css && sass styles/layout_tens_w1.scss styles/layout_tens_w1.css && sass styles/layout_tens_w2.scss styles/layout_tens_w2.css
scripts.min: npm run editor && npm run css-reset && npm run html && npm run css-layout && npm run css-some && npm run css-theme && npm run css-anim && ./node_modules/creative-minifier/index.js --replace-links --globs !node_modules/* --globs !html/* --globs !html/layers/* --globs !editor/* --globs !editor/components/* --globs !editor/elements/* --globs !editor/options/* --globs !editor/settings/* --globs !editor/macros/* --globs !editor/groups/* --globs !sources/* --globs !editor.html --globs !./index.html --globs !./preview.html
scripts.minzip: npm run editor && npm run html && npm run min && npm run zip
